title: Grim Batman’s Fun Pizza Tie-In, China Enters Misinformation War 3.03.22
itunes:title: Grim Batman’s Fun Pizza Tie-In, China Enters Misinformation War 3.03.22
description:
In episode 1096, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian, writer, and host of Celebrity Book Club Chelsea Devantez to discuss Not Even John Bolton Can Handle Newsmax’s Trumpy Bullshit, China Propaganda Accounts Now Supporting Russia’s Invasion Narrative, Unpacking The Batman’s Unhinged Marketing Campaign, The “Russian” Vodka Ban Trend Is Basically Pointless and more!

  1. Not Even John Bolton Can Handle Newsmax’s Trumpy Bullshit
  2. China Propaganda Accounts Now Supporting Russia’s Invasion Narrative
  3. Unpacking The Batman’s Unhinged Marketing Campaign
  4. I ATE LITTLE CAESARS’ ‘THE BATMAN’ CALZONY
  5. Papa John's projects Batman-themed bat signal for free chicken wings
  6. The “Russian” Vodka Ban Trend Is Basically Pointless
  7. Some U.S. governors order state-run liquor stores to stop selling Russian vodka


LISTEN: Closed Place, Open World by Slauson Malone

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
